it.eng.qbe.datasource.configuration.dao.fileimpl
Class ViewsDAOFileImpl

java.lang.Object
  it.eng.qbe.datasource.configuration.dao.fileimpl.ViewsDAOFileImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IViewsDAO
public class ViewsDAOFileImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IViewsDAO

Implementation of IViewsDAO that read model views from a json file named views.json stored within the jar file passed in as argument to the class constructor. NOTE: this class does not support interface methods saveViews. Calling it will cause an exception

Author:
Andrea Gioia
